props.Name: World Serpent
props.Lore: Eternal foe of the Ocean Queen and the Shai'Kar

props.Name: Queen of Lust
props.Description: Grants followers additional Spellpower for all Mind-Affecting spells as well as resistance against them. Also provides +1 Charisma per level.
props.Lore: A corrupt elven goddess, once known as the Queen of Beauty, she is now the most devious and pure servant of the Warp.

props.Name: Warmaster
props.Description: Grants his followers +1 to all Weapon Mastery scores per level and +{1}% Attack. Adds a {2}% Essence cost penalty to all spells.
props.Lore: Elder deity of glory, war and cruelty, sire of orcs and giants, and an eternal foe to all dwarf kin. Many a human warlord in the East turned to the Warmaster for strength to conquer.

props.Name: Arachnia
props.Description: A fallen high-elf arch priestess, Arachnia underwent a terrible transformation as a result of Witch King's sorcery and the terrible events of Fall of Sheoth, when the Warp nearly claimed Edalar for itself. Now she is a goddess of dark magic and treachery, hating both the Witch King and those who had let her fall into his hands.

props.Name: Iron God
props.Follower_Units: Living Armor;Trickster Raven;Onyx Golem;Aether Golem;Eldritch Strix;Sentinel;
props.Lore: Last remnant of the Ancients' technology,

props.Name: Void Lord
props.Follower_Units: Living Armor;Trickster Raven;Onyx Golem;Aether Golem;Eldritch Strix;Sentinel;
props.Description: The Void Lord has only one mission - to wait until the last possible moment before enacting final Dissipation, while the lesser deities of Light and Death seek to show mortals the true path of Void.
props.Lore: Unlike the unruly forces of the Warp, the creatures of Void are patient and only interfere when Dissolution is emminent. Otherwise, they wait for worlds to grow enough so there can be worthy minions to recruit among the millions of mortals to be sacrificed.

props.Name: Lord of Decay
props.Description: An ancient god who feeds continuously on the rotting corpses of wars. In the East, he is regarded as one of the three Primordials, without whom Man could never tame the verdant wilderness.

props.Name: Crimson Queen
props.Passives: Life Steal(8+2*{source_level});SpellGroupParamMod(spell_group,Blood Magic,Boon of the Crimson Queen,spellpower_mod,40);

props.Name: Consumer of Worlds
props.Description: An archfiend that has been trapped in the Abyss below Edalar, Ashgaroth's followers lend him their soulpower in exchange for the services of his demonic minions. Heroes that follow him receive a {1}% Essence discount and Spellpower bonus for all Demonology spells.

props.Name: Night Lord
props.Description: Night Lord's followers are granted natural Darkvision and their Stealth will be increased by 5% per level. All Shadow spells also receive 5% spellpower bonus.
props.Lore: Slain and reborn many times, the Lord of the Dark retains an unseen grip on all the land west of the White City. Patient and inexorable, he will not strike until a proper opportunity presents itself... His strongest minions are the dark elves, who had come as desperate refugees from the devastated lands of Sheoth across the Great Ocean, where the world meets its own tail and sunset becomes sunrise. Many of the Wolf Lords have fallen into his service as well, seduced by power and thrill of the night-time manhunt. On them he bestowed his highest blessing - the Wulfen Curse.

props.Name: Witch King
props.Lore: ASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEKnowledge is power. Keep it to yourself.ASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSE ASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEEnlightenmentASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSE what a folly to believe that mortals can ever achieve it.ASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSE ASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSELet the Chaos ravage the world for a while, until it is ready to fall into our hands. Enemy of our enemies is ourASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSE tool.ASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSE Not much is known about the Witch King, and less can be trusted for is one thing is certain is that he is a god of lies and treachery. But some in the Allkingdom still remember the days of his Reign of Sorcery, the tyranny or terror and atrocities of the Congregation led by Witch Lord Morkei. Today, however, very few choose to serve the fallen godASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEs ends, and only in utter secrecy. But who knows how far does the web stretch in the shadows of the ever conspiring Raven Realm and in the darker places of the world?

props.Name: Lord of Magic
props.Perks: Path of Wizardry({1});Arcane Link({2});Marvel of Magic({3});
props.Follower_Units: Living Armor;Trickster Raven;Onyx Golem;Aether Golem;Eldritch Strix;Sentinel;

props.Name: Faithless
props.Perks: Self-made Fortune: Grants 2 Mastery points, 50 Experience and 50 Gold;
props.Follower_Units: Living Armor;Trickster Raven;Onyx Golem;Aether Golem;Eldritch Strix;Sentinel;
props.Passives: ParamMod(mastery points per level, 1);ParamMod(xp mod, 10);ParamMod(gold mod, 10);ParamBonus(gold cost reduction, {charisma}/2);

props.Name: Sky Queen
props.Description: Grants a {1} Spellpower bonus for all Celestial spells, bonus to Intelligence and Wisdom, {2}% Arcane Resistance and additional Spellpower equal to 1/5 of heroASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEs Charisma.

props.Name: Sun God
props.Description: The greatest of the three Primordials of the Eastern pantheon,

props.Name: Underking
props.Passives: AddProp(standard passives,Infravision);ParamBonus(Behind Sight bonus,1);ParamMod(Detection,14+4*{source_level});ParamBonus(Shadow Resistance|Chaos Resistance|Earth Resistance,8+2*{source_level});SpellGroupParamMod(spell type,Summoning,Dungeon Master,spellpower_mod,35);SpellGroupParamMod(Aspect,Darkness,Dark Depths,spellpower_mod,35);AddProp(standard passives,darkvision);
props.Description: Followers of Dethregor the Underking may receive the gift of Darkvision or Behind Sight (1). They also receive resistance against Earth spells and additional Spellpower for those spells as well as all Darkness spells.
props.Lore: Once an ambitious son of the Allfather, the titan Dethregor underwent great and terrible transformation over time, becoming bound to the Underworld he had sought to conquer and rule...

props.Name: Three Divines
props.Description: Grants additional Charisma, Willpower and Wisdom, provides {1} Shadow resistance and +{2} Spellpower for all spells of Light Aspect.

props.Name: Old Way
props.Description: Hero gains 0.5 Dexterity Vitality and Wisdom per level, {1} Detection and Stealth, +{2} to all Natural Resistances and +{3} Spellpower bonus for Sylvan, Savage and Shadow spells.

props.Name: Fide Arcanum
props.Lore: In a world filled with both complex magic and misguided superstitions, faith in reason has become a force every mage is aware of. Knowing the Principles of the Multiverse, the Primordial Truth of Eidolons, and seeking the answers to the fate of the mortals - this is the Path of the Magi!

props.Name: Dark Gods
props.Description: All spells of Darkness Aspect receive a {1}% Spellpower bonus. Psionic, Chaos and Shadow resistances are increased by {2}. Followers also gain 1 Intelligence for every 5 points of Psychic Mastery, 1 Dexterity for every 5 points of Shadow Mastery and 1 Spellpower per 5 points of Witchery.
props.Lore: Slain and reborn many times, the Lord of the Dark retains an unseen grip on all the land west of the White City. Patient and inexorable, he will not strike until a proper opportunity presents itself... His strongest minions are the dark elves, who had come as desperate refugees from the devastated lands of Sheoth across the Great Ocean, where the world meets its own tail and sunset becomes sunrise. Many of the Wolf Lords have fallen into his service as well, seduced by power and thrill of the night-time manhunt. On them he bestowed his highest blessing - the Wulfen Curse.

props.Name: Masked God
props.Follower_Units: Living Armor;Trickster Raven;Onyx Golem;Aether Golem;Eldritch Strix;Sentinel;
props.Passives: ParamMod(mastery points per level, 1);ParamMod(xp mod, 10);ParamMod(gold mod, 10);ParamBonus(gold cost reduction, {charisma}/2);

props.Name: Aspect of Life
props.Lore: Eternal foe of the Ocean Queen and the Shai'Kar

props.Name: Ocean Queen
props.Lore: Eternal foe of the Ocean Queen and the Shai'Kar
